[![NewtekOne](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/newtek-one_white_logo.svg)](https://www.newtekone.com)

[Contact](/contact/) [Get Started](#)

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-image1.jpg)

**[FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS](/financial-institutions/)**

# Business Lender Program 

Scale your lending capabilities with NewtekOne. 

[Connect with the Team Now](https://www.newtekone.com/contact-financial-institutions/)

## Partner with NewtekOne.

NewtekOne provides a dual-pronged approach in helping institutions take on new business and lending opportunities through our Lender Service Provider and The NewtekOne Referral Program. 

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico1.svg)

Outsource or scale your back-office SBA team.

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico2.svg)

Refer loans you don’t want on your books. 

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico3.svg)

Offer more lending products.

## Business Lender Benefits

From outsourcing to referrals, we support your lending operations. 

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-image2.jpg)

## Outsourcing

If your institution is looking to start a business lending operation or scale current capabilities, NewtekOne can act as your outsourced, back-office SBA lending department. Our team can take on one or more of the following:

  * Structuring & eligibility
  * Credit analysis 
  * Packaging & closing compliance 
  * Auditing 
  * Secondary market management 
  * Portfolio compliance & servicing 



## Loans You Can’t Fund

For lending opportunities you wish not to fund, you can refer the loan to NewtekOne to place on their books, and earn a referral fee when the loan is funded.

## No Competition

NewtekOne does not compete with your depository business, and referring lending opportunities to NewtekOne continues your banking relationship with the borrower versus losing the client altogether to a competing bank. 

## Speak with a Specialist.

Contact us today to learn more about our Business Lender Program.

[Call Us](tel:18557639835) Email Us

## Business Lender Solutions

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-image3.jpg)

### Term Loans

Refinance existing debt, expand business, or gain working capital with loans ranging from $1,000 to $15 million. 

[Learn More](/newtek-lending/term-loans/)

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-image4.jpg)

### Secured Lines of Credit 

Access a continuous source of operating capital up to $1.5 million.

[Learn More](/newtek-lending/lines-of-credit/)

![Newtek](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/newtek-advantage-blue-logo.svg)

Gain instant access to our team of experts and 7 core solutions ready to help your business grow.

  * Team of Solution Experts available 24/7
  * One-click access to NewtekOne Solutions
  * Real time data and analytics



[Register an Account](https://www.newtekone.com/newtek-advantage/#create) [Learn More](https://www.newtekone.com/newtek-advantage/)

![Newtek](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/nt-logo-u.svg)

Open a high yield savings account with a bank that has one focus, helping businesses thrive. 

  * High Yield Savings
  * Checking Account
  * Business Lending
  * One, two, and five year CDs



[Open an Account](https://newtekbank.com/open-account/) [Learn More](https://www.newtekbank.com/)

**[FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS](/financial-institutions/)**

# Branch Cash Advance

Offer more to your clients with NewtekOne solutions. 

[Connect with the Team Now](https://www.newtekone.com/contact-financial-institutions/)

## Partner with NewtekOne for Cash Advance Capabilities.

Expand your lending capabilities with branch cash advance through NewtekOne. Our solutions make it easier to meet client demands with EMV compliant terminals, and no associated service cost. 

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico4.svg)

Provide cash to customers with Visa®, Mastercard®, or Discover®.

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico5.svg)

Provide your branches with free EMV-Compliant terminals. 

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico6-updated.svg)

No-cost solution to provide a valuable service to your customers.

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-image6.png)

## NewtekOne Cash Advance Benefits 

  * There is no cost whatsoever to your institution.
  * We will provide your branches with EMV-compliant terminals at no cost to you, removing counterfeit fraud liability and risk from your institution.
  * Your customers will have the convenience of using any Visa®, Mastercard®, or Discover®, issued by any bank, that allows cash advances.



**If you institution does not currently offer cash advances or you are seeking a new provider, we are here to help.**

## Speak with a Specialist.

Contact us today to learn more about Branch Cash Advance services. 

[Call Us](tel:18557639835) Email Us

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-image7.jpg)

## Have You Recently Lost Your Cash Advance Partner? 

NewtekOne can get your branches up and running in no time at all, with all new EMV-compliant terminals that do not cost your institution a penny. 

[Learn More](/partnership/ )

![Newtek](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/newtek-advantage-blue-logo.svg)

Gain instant access to our team of experts and 7 core solutions ready to help your business grow.

  * Team of Solution Experts available 24/7
  * One-click access to NewtekOne Solutions
  * Real time data and analytics



[Register an Account](https://www.newtekone.com/newtek-advantage/#create) [Learn More](https://www.newtekone.com/newtek-advantage/)

![Newtek](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/nt-logo-u.svg)

**[FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS](/financial-institutions/)**

# Business Solutions Program 

Start offering vital solutions to your small-business clients. 

[Connect with the Team Now](https://www.newtekone.com/contact-financial-institutions/)

## NewtekOne Referral Program

With NewtekOne’s referral program, your institution can immediately begin offering key business solutions that will attract new small-business opportunities and strengthen your existing small-business relationships. 

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico7.svg)

Become a solutions provider for your business customers.

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico8.svg)

Get full transparency on all referrals sent to NewtekOne. 

![image-description](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/themes/best-practices-theme/public/images/fin-ico9.svg)

Earn referral fees on all closed business.

## Complete Suite of Business Solutions

With NewtekOne, you can offer your business banking clients the following:

  * Retail payment processing, Point-of-Sale systems
  * Mobile payment processing 
  * Complete Ecommerce solutions
  * Payroll processing, labor management
  * Employee benefits, group health
  * Commercial & personal insurance
  * Cloud, managed I.T. infrastructure


  * Business term loans
  * Commercial real estate loans
  * Lines of credit, secured by receivables
  * Lines of credit, secure by healthcare receivables
  * Lines of credit, secured by inventory 
  * I.T. solutions and consulting



## Speak with a Specialist.

Contact us today to learn more about our Business Solutions program. 

[Call Us](tel:18557639835) Email Us

## NewTracker™

The secret to cost-effectively acquiring new small-business clients.

## Industries Served

Manufacturing, wholesaling, services, retailing, general, and heavy construction, special trade construction, and more.

## No Additional Costs

The software service is provided to every bank relationship at no cost.

## Key Features

Including full transparency on the back-office activities occurring on every referral, as well as powerful, real-time reporting that allows referring partners to monitor the status of every business referral they submit.

## Patented Referral Process

NewTracker™ is NewtekOne’s patented referral processing and tracking system, and is at the heart of every alliance partnership.

![Newtek](https://www.newtekone.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/newtek-advantage-blue-logo.svg)

**[FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS](/financial-institutions/)**

# Lender-Placed Insurance 

Ensure lending collateral is always insured. 

[Connect with the Team Now](https://www.newtekone.com/contact-financial-institutions/)

## Is Your Collateral Insured?

Highlights of our Lender-Placed Insurance program include:

  * Coverage on specific collateral with lender as loss payee
  * Covers second mortgages and equity loans
  * Option to include liability coverage
  * Flood coverage with no waiting period


  * Residential, commercial, mobile homes, automobiles, and equipment coverage
  * Coverage extends to Other Real Estate Owned (OREO) portfolios
  * Compliance tracking to ensure continued coverage



## Additional Products Available

## Blanket Mortgage Hazard

  * Provides the lender with property coverage on the entire portfolio
  * Covers residential, commercial, and mobile home loans



## Blanket Mortgage Impairment

  * Covers all residential, commercial, second mortgage, and home equity lines of credit
  * Eliminates the need to track or force place mortgaged properties for required insurance



## Outsourced Tracking

  * Full outsourcing of insurance monitoring to an outside computerized tracking facility
  * Automatic coverage of all loan collateral against uninsured physical damage or loss



## Speak with a Specialist.

Contact us today to learn more about our lender-placed insurance. 

[Call Us](tel:18557639835) Email Us

![#](/sites/g/files/knoqqb19346/themes/site/nir_pid1771/client/images/top-newt-bott.png)

# Investor Relations

#  Investor Relations 

## Corporate Profile

[NewtekOne®](https://www.newtekone.com/), Your Business Solutions Company® _,_ is a financial holding company, which along with its bank and non-bank consolidated subsidiaries, provides a wide range of business and financial solutions under the Newtek® brand to the small- and medium-sized business (“SMB”) market. Since 1999, Newtek has provided state-of-the-art, cost-efficient products and services and efficient business strategies to SMB relationships across all 50 states to help them grow their sales, control their expenses and reduce their risk. 

Newtek’s and its subsidiaries’ business and financial solutions include: banking (Newtek Bank, N.A.), [Business Lending,](https://www.newtekone.com/loans/)[Electronic Payment Processing](https://www.newtekone.com/payments/),  _Technology Solutions (Cloud Computing,_ [Data Backup, Storage and Retrieval](https://www.newtekone.com/technology/), IT Consulting), [eCommerce](https://www.newtekone.com/technology/), [Accounts Receivable Financing & Inventory Financing](https://www.newtekone.com/financial-institutions/business-solutions/), [Insurance Solutions](https://www.newtekone.com/insurance/), [Web Services](https://www.newtekone.com/web/), and [Payroll and Benefits Solutions](https://www.newtekone.com/payrollandbenefits/).

[Newtek®](https://www.newtekone.com/), NewtekOne®, Newtek Bank, National AssociationTM,Your Business Solutions Company® and One Solution for All Your Business Needs® are registered trademarks of Newtek Business Services Corp.

## Company Information: NEWT

Newtek is a brand of Newtek Business Services Corp. (NASDAQ: NEWT). Newtek Business Services has been in business for over thirteen years, servicing over 100,000 business accounts in all 50 states. Sales: hello@newtekone.com The Small Business Authority brand has been established to provide real-time state-of-the-art content and business services in order to become the definitive destination for small business owners across the United States.
